scripts.start: echo 'HELLO FROM START SCRIPT' && ls -la && echo 'DIST FOLDER:' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'STARTING SERVER' && npx http-server dist/fuelbot-frontend -p 4200 -a 0.0.0.0
scripts.start:simple: echo 'Starting simple server' && npx http-server dist/fuelbot-frontend -p $PORT -a 0.0.0.0
scripts.start:debug: echo '=== DEBUG START ===' && echo 'PORT:' $PORT && echo 'PWD:' $(pwd) && echo 'FILES:' && ls -la && echo 'DIST:' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'DIST/FUELBOT:' && ls -la dist/fuelbot-frontend/ && echo '=== STARTING SERVER ===' && npx http-server dist/fuelbot-frontend -p $PORT -a 0.0.0.0 -c-1
scripts.start:final: echo '=== FINAL START ===' && echo 'PORT:' $PORT && echo 'PWD:' $(pwd) && echo 'DIST EXISTS:' && ls -la dist/fuelbot-frontend/ && echo 'STARTING SERVER ON 4200' && npx http-server dist/fuelbot-frontend -p 4200 -a 0.0.0.0 -c-1 --cors --silent
